title: [Podcast] Rethinking Brand Purpose with Nick Asbury
description: Learn from branding expert Nick Asbury how brands can strike a better balance between creativity, authenticity, and ethical responsibility.
author: Jacob Cass
excerpt: Learn from branding expert Nick Asbury how brands can strike a better balance between creativity, authenticity, and ethical responsibility.
text: We independently research, test, review, and recommend the best products—learn more about our process. If you buy something through our links, we may earn a commission. Nick challenges the widely accepted notion that brands can simply ‘do well by doing good,’ arguing that purpose-driven marketing often leads to unintended consequences. We explore the rise of corporate purpose post-2008, dissecting examples like Dove and Patagonia to understand where well-intentioned brands can go wrong.
